fields.name: Host
fields.description: Host name to send the probe to.

fields.name: Interval
fields.description: The probing interval in seconds. This is the time interval between two consecutive probes. Acceptable values are from 1 second to 86400 seconds.

fields.name: MinServers
fields.description: Minimum number of servers that are always marked healthy. Default value is 0.

fields.name: Path
fields.description: Relative path of probe. Valid path starts from '/'. Probe is sent to <Protocol>://<host>:<port><path>.

fields.name: PickHostNameFromBackendHTTPSettings
fields.description: Whether the host header should be picked from the backend http settings. Default value is false.

fields.name: PickHostNameFromBackendSettings
fields.description: Whether the server name indication should be picked from the backend settings for Tls protocol. Default value is false.

fields.name: Port
fields.description: Custom port which will be used for probing the backend servers. The valid value ranges from 1 to 65535. In case not set, port from http settings will be used. This property is valid for Basic, Standard_v2 and WAF_v2 only.

fields.name: Timeout
fields.description: The probe timeout in seconds. Probe marked as failed if valid response is not received with this timeout period. Acceptable values are from 1 second to 86400 seconds.

fields.name: UnhealthyThreshold
fields.description: The probe retry count. Backend server is marked down after consecutive probe failure count reaches UnhealthyThreshold. Acceptable values are from 1 second to 20.
